title: LayeredGeoJSON members
description: A vertical layer extent for all standard GeoJSON geometries

verticalReference.description:
A code indicating a vertical reference system. Allowed values:
AGL = Above ground level (or above water surface, as applicable)
AMSL = Above Mean Sea Level
WGS84 = Above the surface of the WGS-84 ellipsoid (Ellipsoidal height)

upper.description: The value of the upper limit of the airspace layer expressed in metres (m) or feet (ft), in relation with the vertical datum specified in the upperReference property. A positive value is interpreted as meaning "above" the reference surface.

lower.description: The value of the lower limit of the airspace layer expressed in metres (m) or feet (ft), in relation with the vertical datum specified in the lowerReference property. A positive value is interpreted as meaning "above" the reference surface.

uom.description:
The unit of measurement in which the upper and lower values are expressed. Allowable values:
m = metres
ft = feet
If this member is not specified, the units should be assumed to be metres.
